 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּאה‎</span>] **verb** perhaps (si vera lectio) ==cleave in pieces== (Arabic (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cleave, split*** (head, bowl, etc.); Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פעי‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxx (1876), 701 f.</sup>); — 

**Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַפְאֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Deut.32.26|Deut 32:26]] ***I*** [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>] ***will cleave them in pieces*** (possibly point <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפ‎</span>, i.e. **Qal**; ==on other views see [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; read perhaps== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲפִיצֵם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Gr|Gr]]).
